掠水王.en: someone who is an expert in making money through dishonest means ,  trickery [colloquial]

擺薄落.en: to set a road block; to set up a speed trap [colloquial]

著草鞋.en: to go into hiding; to be on the run [colloquial]

辛苦搵嚟志在食.en: one works hard so that one can eat better [colloquial]

食ｍｏｎｍｏｎ.en: baby talk telling baby to eat [colloquial]

馬特洪峰.en: Matterhorn, a mountain of the Alps [written and colloquial]

髧兜.en: idiot; describes someone who is very stupid [colloquial]

gun, firearm, rifle, spear, thing with shape or function similar to a gun M: 支zhī [支] ,  把bǎ [把] ,  杆gǎn [杆] ,  条tiáo [条] ,  枝zhī [枝], to substitute for another person in a test, to knock, classifier for rifle shots, lance, javelin,  # adapted from cc-cedict
